Entries.movieTheater: @! A movie theater seems to have appeared in the valley!$h#$e#$c 0.3#Here's a ticket![809]#It's nice to have more entertainment options available in the valley#$e#
Entries.dumped_Guys: I can't believe you'd be so cruel, dating all of them like that.$s

Entries.Town4: @! I hear you're going to have a child soon! Have you picked out a name yet?

Entries.winter_Tue4: @, you've got any good ideas of how to improve our town?#$b#I've been looking into telecommunications grants. We could do with better internet coverage.
Entries.winter_Wed8: @, I'm glad you've come to Pelican Town. With you here, our exports have been doing better than ever!
Entries.winter_Thu8: Picked up quite a bit of cheese from Marnie's last night. She does produce some excellent cheese, if I may say so myself.
Entries.1{{YearRemainder}}: Neighboring town lowered its property taxes to try to get more young professionals to move in.#$b#Young remote professionals make a lot of money and are good for the tax base.
Entries.2{{YearRemainder}}: It's not easy, being mayor of a small town. We're so small that we're economically quite fragile.
Entries.3{{YearRemainder}}: I've been talking to a green energy company recently. They're thinking about renting out some land 'round these parts for windmills.#$b#What do you think? You've got some land to rent to them?
